verses.verse: "I Have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with my <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> then could I <S%H995>gaze<s%> at a <S%H1330>virgin<s%>?
"And <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> from <S%H4605>above<s%> Or the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> from on <S%H4791>high<s%>?
"Is it not <S%H343>calamity<s%> to the <S%H5767>unjust,<s%> And <S%H5235>disaster<s%> to those who <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%>?
"Does He not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> And <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6806>steps<s%>?
<S%H518>"If<s%> I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H7723>falsehood,<s%> And my <S%H7272>foot<s%> has <S%H2363>hastened<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> <S%H4820>deceit,<s%>
Let Him <S%H8254>weigh<s%> me with <S%H6664>accurate<s%> <S%H3976>scales,<s%> And let <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H8538>integrity.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> my <S%H838>step<s%> has <S%H5186>turned<s%> from the <S%H1870>way,<s%> Or my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H1980><s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> Or if any <S%H3971>spot<s%> has <S%H1692>stuck<s%> to my <S%H3709>hands,<s%>
Let me <S%H2232>sow<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H398>eat,<s%> And let my <S%H6631>crops<s%> be <S%H8327>uprooted.<s%>
<S%H518>"If<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> has been <S%H6601>enticed<s%> by a <S%H802>woman,<s%> Or I have <S%H693>lurked<s%> at my neighbor's <S%H6607>doorway,<s%>
May my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H2912>grind<s%> for <S%H312>another,<s%> And let <S%H312>others<s%> <S%H3766>kneel<s%> <S%H3766>down<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> her.
"For that would be a <S%H2154>lustful<s%> <S%H2154>crime;<s%> Moreover, it would be an <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> [punishable by] <S%H6414>judges.<s%>
"For it would be <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H398>consumes<s%> to <S%H11>Abaddon,<s%> And would <S%H8327>uproot<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H8393>increase.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> I have <S%H3988>despised<s%> the <S%H4941>claim<s%> of my <S%H5650>male<s%> or <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H519>slaves<s%> <S%H5650><s%> When they <S%H7378>filed<s%> a <S%H7379>complaint<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> me,

<S%H4100>What<s%> then could I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6965>arises,<s%> And <S%H3588>when<s%> He <S%H6485>calls<s%> me to <S%H6485>account,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> will I <S%H7725>answer<s%> Him?
"Did not He who <S%H6213>made<s%> me in the <S%H990>womb<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> him, And the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3559>fashion<s%> us in the <S%H7358>womb<s%>?
<S%H518>"If<s%> I have <S%H4513>kept<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> from [their] <S%H2656>desire,<s%> Or have caused the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H490>widow<s%> to <S%H3615>fail,<s%>
Or have <S%H398>eaten<s%> my <S%H6595>morsel<s%> <S%H905>alone,<s%> And the <S%H3490>orphan<s%> has not <S%H398>shared<s%> <S%H4480><s%> it
(But from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> he <S%H1431>grew<s%> up with me as with a father, And from <S%H1>infancy<s%> <S%H517><s%> I <S%H990>guided<s%> her),
<S%H518>If<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> anyone perish for <S%H6>lack<s%> of <S%H1097>clothing,<s%> Or that the <S%H3830>needy<s%> <S%H34>had<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>covering,<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> his <S%H2504>loins<s%> have not <S%H1288>thanked<s%> me, And if he has not been <S%H2552>warmed<s%> with the <S%H1488>fleece<s%> of my <S%H3532>sheep,<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> I have <S%H5130>lifted<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3490>orphan,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> I had <S%H5833>support<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%>
Let my <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> from the <S%H7926>socket,<s%> And my <S%H248>arm<s%> be <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H7665>off<s%> at the <S%H7070>elbow.<s%>
"For <S%H343>calamity<s%> from <S%H410>God<s%> is a <S%H6343>terror<s%> to me, And <S%H4480>because<s%> of His <S%H7613>majesty<s%> I <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H3201>do<s%> <S%H3808>nothing.<s%>
<S%H518>"If<s%> I have <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H3689>confidence<s%> [in] <S%H2091>gold,<s%> And <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H3800>fine<s%> <S%H3800>gold<s%> my <S%H4009>trust,<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> I have <S%H8055>gloated<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> my <S%H2428>wealth<s%> was <S%H7227>great,<s%> And <S%H3588>because<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> had <S%H4672>secured<s%> [so] <S%H3524>much;<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> I have <S%H7200>looked<s%> at the <S%H216>sun<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it <S%H9096>shone,<s%> Or the <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> in <S%H3368>splendor,<s%>
And my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6601>became<s%> <S%H5643>secretly<s%> <S%H6601>enticed,<s%> And my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5401>threw<s%> a <S%H5401>kiss<s%> from my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%>
That <S%H1571>too<s%> would have been an <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> [calling for] <S%H6416>judgment,<s%> For I would have <S%H3584>denied<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H4480>above.<s%> <S%H4605><s%>
"Have I <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> at the <S%H6365>extinction<s%> of my <S%H8130>enemy,<s%> Or <S%H5782>exulted<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H4672>befell<s%> him?
<S%H3808>"No,<s%> I have not <S%H5414>allowed<s%> my <S%H2441>mouth<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%> By <S%H7592>asking<s%> for his <S%H5315>life<s%> in a <S%H423>curse.<s%>
"Have the <S%H4962>men<s%> of my <S%H168>tent<s%> not <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>'Who<s%> can <S%H5414>find<s%> one who has not been <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with his <S%H1320>meat<s%>'?
"The <S%H1616>alien<s%> has not <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%> [For] I have <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H1817>doors<s%> to the <S%H734>traveler.<s%>
"Have I <S%H3680>covered<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> like <S%H121>Adam,<s%> By <S%H2934>hiding<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in my <S%H2243>bosom,<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H6206>feared<s%> the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> And the <S%H937>contempt<s%> of <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H2865>terrified<s%> me, And <S%H1826>kept<s%> <S%H1826>silent<s%> and did not <S%H3318>go<s%> out of <S%H6607>doors<s%>?

<S%H4310>"Oh<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that I <S%H5414>had<s%> one to <S%H8085>hear<s%> me! <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H2005>here<s%> is my <S%H8420>signature;<s%> Let the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> me! And the <S%H5612>indictment<s%> which my <S%H7379>adversary<s%> has <S%H3789>written,<s%>
<S%H518>Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> I would <S%H5375>carry<s%> it on my <S%H7926>shoulder;<s%> I would <S%H6029>bind<s%> it to myself like a <S%H5850>crown.<s%>
"I would <S%H5608>declare<s%> to Him the <S%H4557>number<s%> of my <S%H6806>steps;<s%> <S%H3644>Like<s%> a <S%H5057>prince<s%> I would <S%H7126>approach<s%> Him.
<S%H518>"If<s%> my <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H2199>cries<s%> out <S%H5921>against<s%> me, And its <S%H8525>furrows<s%> <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> its <S%H3581>fruit<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H3701>money,<s%> Or have caused its <S%H1167>owners<s%> to <S%H5301>lose<s%> their <S%H5315>lives,<s%>

Let <S%H2336>briars<s%> <S%H3318>grow<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> And <S%H890>stinkweed<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H8184>barley.<s%>" The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H347>Job<s%> are <S%H8552>ended.<s%>
